basic_info.description: I am Tsay Yong, an aspiring software engineer who has been at it since 2017, currently based in Singapore. I am a full-stack developer, with Javascript(~4 YOE) and Python(~5 YOE) as my languages of choice. Having taken part in tons of startup hackathons, as well as done plenty of personal projects and internships, I have good experience with various frameworks, from cross-platform development frameworks like React Native, to backend frameworks like NodeJS and Django.
basic_info.description_2: I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's of Computing (CS) at NUS.
basic_info.description_bold: I am excited to help you or your organization build the next big thing.

projects.title: Pixorift
projects.description: A Scavenger Hunt in which players have to find particular objects in the world to photograph. Upon taking that photo, the app uses object recognition and if it passes the test case, the user then receives game points. The app has social aspects to allow users to share their progress with each other.

projects.title: Class Minecraft Server
projects.description: Due to COVID-19, school was cancelled and classes were held online. This server was launched in an effort to maintain the class community tight-knit and friendly. To create a unique experience, I wrote custom plugins (modifications to the game) in order to let the players have a more enjoyable time, using Java. Examples of plugins include a custom shop to buy unique powers a normal Minecraft player would not have access to, a live map to see how the world looked, etc.

projects.title: ZapQ - A Virtual Queuing App
projects.description: During the COVID-19 pandemic, it was dangerous to spend excessive time outside due to transmission risk - one such high risk activity was spending multiple hours in long queues. This app aims to ditch the physical queue, adopting one virtually instead. It uses React Native/Django as the tech stack.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
achievements: Contributing to the development of Jetpac, a software-as-a-service eSim platform responsible for generating $5,000,000 ARR.
Closed 15 Jira tickets, which include contributions to various parts of the stack, from React.js, AWS to the Golang backend.
Implemented 6 CRUD API endpoints for Catalog Pages, connecting them with foreign key relationships to Catalog databases.
Created and deployed 4 email workflows on AWS SES & integrated backend for automated eCommerce purchase communications.
Working with the React.js(TS)/Golang/CockroachDB tech stack; learnt to use tools such as AWS, BitBucket, Jira, Dbeaver, Kubernetes and how to build software under the AGILE development methodologies.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Part of the Open Government Products Team, a team aiming to contribute to open source projects of the Singapore Government.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Helped resolve 15 GitHub issues, implementing 9 new features & resolving 6 bugs. Most notable contributions as follows:
achievements: Migrated video player within the application from the default HTML player to VideoJS - a secure, standardized library - to implement features requested by clients.

Aided with building the large-scale implementation of multi-user teams - a project aimed at allowing multiple users to work concurrently on projects & introducing permission systems - contributing mainly to the logging system.
Contributed to the data structure design of how logs are stored and retrieved for use - to enable a flexible system that allows for accurate searchability.
Built the logging system's front-end UI and implemented the back-end API to retrieve data from the database.
Built the front-end UI of User Themes - a project aimed at letting users create and store their own custom themes, instead of being limited to presets.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Led the tech effort in digitizing the club; a few notable contributions are as follows:
achievements: Inventory Management Script: Wrote a script in Python that helped with accounting inventory for school merchandise sales during Entreweek 2020, which resulted in a ~10% reduction in sale time and a ~90% time reduction for accounting profits and stocks post-sale.
Website: Designed a WordPress website to help with the CCA's marketing effort, driving more traffic to the on-site stores and improving the sales funnel by providing an online alternative.

experience.title: ZapQ - a virtual queuing app
experience.description: Built this app with 3 friends as a solution to reduce transmission risk during COVID; my contributions are as follows:
achievements: Developed the backend REST framework
Contributed to the System Design for the project

experience.title: Minecraft Server Developer
experience.description: Built a Minecraft server for my class, as a bonding activity during COVID:
achievements: Deployed and balanced custom coded plugins written in Java
Maintained the server through balance updates and bug fixes

experience.title: Machine Learning Internship
achievements: Built a predictive modeling system to pre-empt potential failures in ship systems
Learnt to use PyTorch to build decision trees for machine learning

experience.title: Software Engineer Internship
experience.description: Interned with 2 friends, wrote software to improve their organizational efficiency; a few notable contributions are as follows:
achievements: Project GAM(Gnowbe Auto-Marker): Wrote an auto-marking script in Python that assessed open-ended questions, using Natural Language Processing, helping Professors on the platform grade student assignments more efficiently. A score is given to each response.
Task-Management Scripts: Wrote a script in Python that helped sort out the staff's day to day schedule, reducing time wastage during the day.

experience.title: Pixorift
experience.description: Wrote an app that works essentially as a Scavenger Hunt, in which players have to find objects in the world to photograph. If the object recognition software passes the image, the user gets a point. The app has social functions to pair with the game.
achievements: Wrote a cross-platform mobile application in React Native for the Front-End
Developed a Django REST Framework to function as the Back-End
Used Tensorflow to build the object recognition technology
